description: The ActionGroupConfig resource allows the creation and management of Avi ActionGroupConfig

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

ActionScriptConfigRef.description: Reference of the action script configuration to be used. It is a reference to an object of type alertscriptconfig.

AutoscaleTriggerNotification.description: Trigger notification to autoscale manager. Allowed in basic(allowed values- false) edition, essentials(allowed values- false) edition, enterprise edition.

Description.description: User defined description for the object.

EmailConfigRef.description: Select the email notification configuration to use when sending alerts via email. It is a reference to an object of type alertemailconfig.

ExternalOnly.description: Generate alert only to external destinations. Allowed in basic(allowed values- false) edition, essentials(allowed values- false) edition, enterprise edition.

Level.description: When an alert is generated, mark its priority via the alert level. Enum options - ALERT_LOW, ALERT_MEDIUM, ALERT_HIGH.

SnmpTrapProfileRef.description: Select the snmp trap notification to use when sending alerts via snmp trap. It is a reference to an object of type snmptrapprofile.

SyslogConfigRef.description: Select the syslog notification configuration to use when sending alerts via syslog. It is a reference to an object of type alertsyslogconfig.

TenantRef.description: It is a reference to an object of type tenant.
